I have paused the crawl
Clicked on the Logs link at top and then clicked on=
 the 'Rotate
crawler logs' link. The manual states ""Clicking on Rotate Log=
s  will
move aside all current crawl logs appending a 14-digit GMT timestam=
p
to the moved-aside logs. New log files will be opened for the crawler
to =
use in subsequent crawling."

I then viewed the logs directory for the job =
and do not see the new
set of log files created. 

I have tried this in 1.1=
0.2 and 1.12.1 to see if this was fixed in a
later version with no success.=


Mike
